title: How to Store Rice Paper

steps.headline: When purchasing, check for quality.
steps.description: Ensure that none of the rounds are broken or cracked.

steps.headline: Keep the rounds in their original packaging in a cool, dry place.
steps.description: Once opened, wrap carefully to create an airtight environment, using food-grade plastic wrap.

steps.headline: Use within the date specified on the packaging.

text: When purchasing, check for quality. Ensure that none of the rounds are broken or cracked. Keep the rounds in their original packaging in a cool, dry place. Once opened, wrap carefully to create an airtight environment, using food-grade plastic wrap. Use within the date specified on the packaging.
sentences: Ensure that none of the rounds are broken or cracked.
Keep the rounds in their original packaging in a cool, dry place.
Once opened, wrap carefully to create an airtight environment, using food-grade plastic wrap.
Use within the date specified on the packaging.
